name: pasteurization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of heating something, especially milk, at a controlled temperature for a fixed period of time in order to kill bacteria: Pasteurization kills dangerous bacteria. They were one of the first dairies to implement the pasteurization process. See
pasteurize
